note:
A father. My first computer was a TI-99/4a, since then, I build -mostly- with bits.  Moved by the writings of Hannah Arendt, Albert Camus and Ursula K. Le Guin.  Soy papá.  Mi primera computadora fue una TI-99/4a y desde entonces casi todo lo que construyo es con bits. Me mueve profundamente la obra de Hannah Arendt, Albert Camus y Ursula K. Le Guin.
-—
“…I make friends. They're toys. My friends are toys. I make them. It's a hobby. “
